name: 12 Labours of Hercules VII: Fleecing the Fleece (Platinum Edition)
description: It's a new bromance from ancient Greece: when cunning Pelias orders the hero Jason to steal the Golden Fleece from the land of Colchis.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 64bit Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 resolution DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: With OpenAL support
